item.title: Scenes from TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: Thanks to everyone who made this year's San Francisco event what it was -- and to the 10,000 of you who filled the halls, made the connections, and le...

item.title: Navan IPO tumbles 20% after historic debut under SEC shutdown workaround
item.description: Navan finished its first day trading at an approximate valuation of $4.7 billion, which is about half of its last private valuation of $9.2 billion.

item.title: Nvidia is reportedly investing up to $1B in Poolside
item.description: Nvidia is an existing investor in the AI company and participated in its $500 million Series A round in 2024.

item.title: Canva launches its own design model, adds new AI features to the platform
item.description: Canva is launching new features like Forms and email design, and it makes Affinity free for all users.

item.title: Bevel raises $10M Series A from General Catalyst for its AI health companion
item.description: Bevel's AI health companion unifies data from wearables and daily habits across sleep, fitness, and nutrition into personalized insights.
